column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Uh ... Hey , Suki . "
#Text=Suki says : " Hoping for another dance lesson ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " No ... I ... well , let me explain . "
#Text=Suki says : " Spit it out !
#Text=" Suki says : " Even if I 'm a girl ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm sorry if I insulted you earlier .
#Text=I was ... wrong .
#Text=" Suki says : " We normally do n't teach outsiders , let alone boys .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Please make an exception .
#Text=I wo n't let you down .
#Text=" Suki says : " All right .
#Text=But you have to follow all of our traditions .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course !
#Text=" Suki says : " And I mean all of them .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do I really have to wear this ?
#Text=It feels a little ... girly .
#Text=" Suki says : " It 's a warrior 's uniform , you should be proud .
#Text=The silk threads symbolize the brave blood that flows through our veins .
#Text=The gold insignia represents the honor of the warrior 's heart .
#Text="
